caption:
“The narrow path leads home.”

Reflection:
Few walk the way of faith, for it winds through hardship and humility. Yet its end is joy beyond imagining.

Commentary:
This line evokes Christ’s teaching that the narrow way is the true way. The difficult road of integrity and love leads to eternal peace.
